name: The Final Roll
description:
Fight the onslaught of non-dice board-game items in this endless shooter.
Move around carefully to avoid having the "1"-side up, or take your chances and roll the die to dash away from enemies.

Made in 48-hours as an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. 
See https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022 for more info.

Controls:

Use arrow-keys or WASD to move around.
Mouse to aim, left mouse-button to shoot.

Shift to roll the die.

Instructions:

You can only shoot when "6" is shown.
You recieve damage when "1" is shown.
You regain ammo when "2", "3", "4" or "5" is shown.
Collect experience-dice to level up and upgrade the sides of your die!

Art and sounds used:

Art assets: Kenney https://kenney.nl/
Music: Kenney https://kenney.nl/ 
Sound effects: Homemade
